posts.post_title: WTB T206 raw Tinker and Chance (red) portraits
posts.post_content:
I'm looking to pick up raw examples of each, ideally in strong Good to VG+ condition, and with solid eye appeal. If you are willing to part with either for a reasonable price, please email me at [url]itjclarke@yahoo.com[/url].

Thanks,
Ian
